title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Customized Information Literacy Workshop for Nutrition Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of nutrition and general academic research skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Systematically search topic-specific information in reputable academic databases related to nutrition

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
